changelog:
– Drag & drop button reordering via dedicated Edit Mode.
– Tooltips enabled by default (can be toggled in settings; requires restart to apply).
– Version number now displayed in the settings panel.
– Null object creation now enables Motion Blur and applies Motion Tile with presets.
– Added version check system to track updates.
– Fixed: Settings panel not opening.
– Improved UI layout and context menu positioning.
– Most settings now apply instantly, except tooltip toggle.
